Name: Somnuek
description:
Somnuek is a single 60-year-old woman living in a small village in Surin province, and she earns her income from selling snacks, beverages, and personal care products. During this period, there are many small shops in her village, so it's quite a highly competitive business to run.

To cope with the situation, she has looked for a financial source to develop and extend her business, and then it was suggested from the Village Bank committee to apply for this project. Based on her application purpose, she plans to spend her loan buying snacks, beverages,and personal care products for selling in her store.

This loan would be helpful for Somnuek to develop and extend her business and increase the capacity of her business in the highly competitive circumstance.
